messages.message: Hi! I'm interested in your dermal filler services. Can you provide more information?

messages.senderProfilePicture: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40"><rect width="40" height="40" rx="8" fill="%23f3f4f6"/><text x="50%" y="50%" dominant-baseline="middle" text-anchor="middle" fill="%239ca3af" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">IMG</text></svg>
messages.message: What are your available time slots for next week?
messages.replyMessage: Hi Jessica! We have availability on Tuesday and Thursday. Would you like to schedule a consultation?
